title: Bad Moon Rising
description: When 19-year old Robert Fulton returns to Berlin, New Hampshire after his first semester away from college, he prepares to face his dysfunctional family. Over the next few days, four wolves begin a reign of terror throughout the town. Following a disasterous family reunion, Robert begins to head back to Boston. When his car crashes in a remote section of town, he must face these creatures - alone.
author: S.D. Curran
